A warehouse of challenges and solutions.

Project27 is a guide on a wide range of topics, based on the skills, experiences, and knowledge of a scientifically minded, blind person. It is a personal edition of the “Hitchhikers’ guide to the galaxy”.

Read more about Project27

The Blog

The blog is a place to read opinion based posts on casual topics, as well as posts on the development of this project.

Open the blog

The Guide

The Guide is a set of volumes, including scribbles on how to do specific things as a blind person, let it be a technical challenge, or a matter of lifestyle.

Open the Guide

The Project27 site was last updated on: 21 May 2021.
